br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

Class DefaultRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.DefaultRules

  • public class DefaultRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic set of rules for any match, including the rules/logic for determining victory or defeat. Matches with special conditions may extend this class.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float elapsedTime)
        This method should be called to update the timer whenever the interface is updated.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the start of the match.

      • gameState

        public java.lang.String gameState()
        Gets the game state according to the object's parameters. The loser of a match is the one whose life or cards are completely depleted first or the one whose life is lesser than the opponent's when the time is over. In case of a draw, the human player wins.
        Returns:
        A string describing the state. Its possible values are specified by static parameters.
